statements: DELETE FROM SavingsPlan WHERE customer_id = 100 AND savings_amount > 5000;
DELETE FROM SavingsPlan WHERE interest_rate >= 0.05 AND customer_id = 200;
DELETE FROM SavingsPlans WHERE customer_id = 200 AND investment_amount > 5000;
DELETE FROM SavingsPlan WHERE amount_invested > 10000 AND interest_rate < 4.5;
DELETE FROM Customer WHERE age < 30 AND gender = 'Male'
DELETE FROM CustomerInvestments WHERE customer_id = 100 AND investment_id = 200;
DELETE FROM Investments WHERE savings_plan_id = (SELECT savings_plan_id FROM SavingsPlan WHERE plan_name = 'Retirement Plan') AND investment_date < '2021-01-01';
